properties.entry: SELECT TAG_NO FROM TB_TAG WHERE TAG_NAME = ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT TAG_NO, TAG_NAME, COUNT(*)OVER(PARTITION BY TAG_NO) COUNT FROM TB_TAG LEFT JOIN TB_RECIPE_TAG USING(TAG_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_NOTICE_TAG USING(TAG_NO) ORDER BY TAG_NO) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
